title: Task 4: Introduce conflict management for Git operations.
description: Add logic to handle Git conflicts gracefully when multiple users edit Kanban cards or the board.
blockReason:
Created text is a text written by a non-native speaker for a non-native audience to achieve specific curricular goals. Created texts have been a common feature in language classrooms, but educators are increasingly using more authentic texts in their teaching. 
Here are some other types of text:
Semi-authentic text: Based on authentic language material, but can be for native or non-native audiences 
Authentic text: Produced by a native speaker for native readers 
Generated text: Automatically produced coherent and meaningful text, which can be in the form of sentences, paragraphs, or even entire documents 
AI writing generators can be used to generate text based on a prompt and a few settings. Some examples of AI writing generators include: 
Writer: Best for AI compliance
Writesonic: Best for content marketing
